# depthDataType

**Instance Property**

The pixel format of the depth data map.

## Declaration

```swift
var depthDataType: OSType { get }
```

## Reading pixel depth information

- **depthDataMap**: A pixel buffer containing the depth data’s per-pixel depth or disparity data map.
